name: 黃希敏
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
schedule:
01	 Movie	 
02	 “The Apprentice” Ep. 7: It's More Than Decor 
03	 Game 1
04	 “The Apprentice” Ep. 8: A Slice of Heaven
05	 Game 2
06	 “The Apprentice” Ep. 9: Assault on Battery
07	 HOLIDAY
08	 Game 3 
09	 Midterm
10	 “The Apprentice” Ep. 10: Blow Out  
11	 Game 4 
12	 “The Apprentice” Ep. 11: Back to School
13	 Game 5 
14	 “The Apprentice” Ep. 12: Backs Against the Wal-Mart  
15	 Game 6 
16	 “The Apprentice” Ep. 13: Who Wears the Pants? 
17	 Game 7
18	 Final
scorePolicy:
1. Group discussions and oral reports   30%
2. Game designing and leading           10%
3. Midterm + Final (Individual Talk)    60%
4. Spontaneous Q & A                    bonus credits
materials:
1. The US reality show:“The Apprentice”video [Season 5]
2. Handouts provided by the instructor
3. American colloquialisms [美國人這樣說(書林)]
